name: circumflex
content:
circumflex noun [C]
(IN WRITING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a sign (^) over a letter, especially a vowel, that shows that it has a different pronunciation from the letter without a sign over it

circumflex noun [C]
(IN THE BODY)
medical
  specialized Circumflex nerves, arteries, or veins bend around an organ or body part.
